root.name: Summer Games II
root.description: The game plays as a multi-sport competition called the “Epyx Games” because there was no official license with the International Olympics Committee. Up to 8 players can choose a country to represent and take turns competing in selected events to win medals. World records where savable to the game disk. Certain ports allowed you to compete in the original eight Summer Games events, or play all 16 in a marathon session, but you have to own the original Summer Games for this to work. EventsTriple JumpHigh JumpRowingJavelin ThrowEquestrianFencingKayakingCycling

similar_games.game: Beijing 2008: The Official Video Game of the Olympic Games
